long_description: offering bikes for rent, as well as wi-fi throughout the property, the 3-star pingyao baichanghong inn is about 5 minutes' drive from rishengchang former bank. located within a 5-minute drive of city wall of pingyao, this guest house features 18 rooms with views of the town. no. 47 nan da jie, pingyao , pingyao , china , 031100 ,shanxi. the pingyao baichanghong inn is located in the pingyao ancient city district. airport shuttle is one of the services offered by the pingyao baichanghong inn hotel.

generated_description: pingyao baichanghong inn is a 3-star guest house located in pingyao, china. the inn offers 18 rooms with views of the town and features amenities such as wi-fi and bike rentals. it is situated within a 5-minute drive of the city wall of pingyao and rishengchang former bank. the property is also near the ming and qing dynasties street, city god temple of pingyao, and other historical sites. the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, private bathrooms, and soundproof windows. the inn provides amenities like a wellness area, free parking, and a 24-hour reception.
